page.title: 13INDUSTRY IN STOCKTON.
page.content: OTHER THAN AGRICULTURE THE ONLY TWO EMPLOYMENT CENTRES ARE APLEY ESTATE YARD IN WINDMILL LANE AND ALDONA IN VILLAGE ROAD.APLEY ESTATE YARD WAS ESTABLISHED HERE IN 192O, FORMERLY IT WAS IN INNAGE LANE,BRIDGNORTH,BUT AS THE ESTATE EXPANDED NORTH LARGE AREAS BECAME REMOTE FROM THE YARD & SO IT WAS CENTRALISED IN NORTON IN 192O.IT IS THE SIGNING ON POINT FOR ALL WORKER ON THE ESTATE,CARPENTERS,PAINTERS,FORESTERS,G AMEKEEPERS,ETC,AS WELL AS STORING TOOLS,MATERIALS,TIMBER,ETC.A TRACTION ENGINE WAS HERE UNTIL 1945 FOR DRIVING THE SAW MILL. 12 MEN ARE EMPLOYED AT THE YARD. ALDONA IS LOCATED IN THE 17TH CENTURY SMITHY IN VILLAGE ROAD, EMPLOYS 4 MEN AND PRODUCES SMALL PARTS FOR FORK LIFT TRUCKS AND OTHER FACTORY EQUIPMENT.
